Ru_trainchinese: chóng: (сущ) насекомое, червь; (обр.) подлый человек, змея подколодная
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: I see the bottom of this kanji as an arm, and the top is an insect biting into the arm, sucking some blood.
origin_of_ch_char_book: (蟲, 虫, chong, insect) It features a large group of worms that have sharp heads and crawling bodies. Some worms, like caterpillars, have a poisonous sting, so that it is pointed with a sharp prick as it stings like a snake. (强, qiang, strong) The left side is the bow, and the upper right is the horn of the insect that looks like a mouth , and an insect underneath that. It is a stag beetle with arched horns like a bow. Stag beetles are strong and powerful. One bite brings a great deal of pain to a person. It is therefore used as ‘ strong ‘.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the three " worms ", the general name of the worms. " Chong " and "薵" are both comprehensible words made by repeating the same radical " Chong ". In Jiajin inscriptions , the characters from "䖵" are more common, and the characters " worm " are rare. From the " worm " or from the word "䖵", such as " insanity ." Chu text independent " worm " as a radical and a " worm " has a "䖵sound" (Quinn) is. (Refer to Chen Jian) For example, Guodian Bamboo Slip "Lao Zi" Jiaben Slip 21 "You (have) [爿页] (状)worm (mixed) Cheng". Liu Zhao believes that the same radicals in ancient scripts are often indistinguishable from two or three. " Chong " can be regarded as the traditional Chinese version of "薵". Ji Xusheng believes that " worm " and "薵" are actually synonymous.

"Shuowen" thinks that " worm " is the general name of footed animals. "Shuowen": "Insects, there are worms that are enough to say, but there are no worms that are enough." "Er Ya. Shi Chong: "There are worms with feet, but worms without feet." Xing Jingshu: "For Wener, prose is without feet and worms." Therefore, " worms " can be a generic term for all animals, including people. Such as "Warring States Policy. "Qin Ce II": "The tiger is the worm; the human is the sweet bait." "The Great Dai Liji." "Zengzi Tianyuan": "The essence of caterpillars is called Lin, the essence of feather worms is called phoenix, the essence of worms is called turtle, the essence of scale worms is called dragon, and the essence of worms is called saint."

" Bug " mostly means insects. Such as "Xunzi. "Encourage Learning": "The meat rots with insects, and the fish grows with beetles." "Han Shu. "Five Elements": "During Emperor Zhao's time, the big willow tree in Shanglin Garden broke off its ground. Once it stood up, it grew branches and leaves, and insects ate its leaves, and it became written, saying "Gongsun's disease has been established."

" Chong " is also an ancient place name, in today's Jining, Shandong. Such as "Chun Qiu Zuo Zhuan. "Zhaogong Nineteenth Biography": "In February, Song Gong defeated Lu and encircled insects." Du pre-note: "Insects, Luyi."
humanum_short_description_en: From the three " worms ", the general name of the worms. "Shuowen" thinks that " worm " is the general name of footed animals.
humanum_full_description:
從三「虫」，會蟲之總名。「蟲」和「䖵」都是重複同一偏旁「虫」而成的會意字。甲金文多見從「䖵」的字，少見從「蟲」的字。從「蟲」的字或從「䖵」，如「蠱」。楚文字中獨立的「蟲」和作偏旁的「蟲」都有「䖵」（昆）的音。（參陳劍）例如郭店簡《老子》甲本簡21「又（有）[爿頁]（狀）蟲（混）成」。劉釗認為古文字中相同偏旁從二個或三個經常無別，「蟲」可看成是「䖵」的繁體。季旭昇認為「蟲」和「䖵」實本同義。

　　《說文》以為「蟲」是有足動物的總名。《說文》：「蟲，有足謂之蟲，無足謂之豸。」此說或本於《爾雅》。《爾雅．釋蟲》：「有足謂之蟲，無足謂之豸。」邢昺疏：「此對文爾，散文則無足亦曰蟲。」故「蟲」可以是一切動物包括人的通稱。如《戰國策．秦策二》：「虎者，戾蟲；人者，甘餌也。」《大戴禮記．曾子天圓》：「毛蟲之精者曰麟，羽蟲之精者曰鳳，介蟲之精者曰龜，鱗蟲之精者曰龍，倮蟲之精者曰聖人。」

　　「蟲」多表示昆蟲。如《荀子．勸學》：「肉腐生蟲，魚栝生蠹。」《漢書．五行志》：「昭帝時，上林苑中大柳樹斷仆地，一朝起立，生枝葉，有蟲食其葉，成文字，曰『公孫病已立』。」

　　「蟲」也是古地名，在今山東濟寧境內。如《春秋左傳．昭公十九年傳》：「二月，宋公伐邾，圍蟲。」杜預注：「蟲，邾邑。」
humanum_short_description: 從三「虫」，會蟲之總名。《說文》以為「蟲」是有足動物的總名。

從三「 虫 」，會蟲之總名。「 蟲 」和「 䖵 」都是重複同一偏旁「 虫 」而成的會意字。甲金文多見從「 䖵 」的字，少見從「 蟲 」的字。從「 蟲 」的字或從「 䖵 」，如「 蠱 」。楚文字中獨立的「 蟲 」和作偏旁的「 蟲 」都有「 䖵 」（昆）的音。（參陳劍）例如郭店簡《老子》甲本簡21「又（有）[爿頁]（狀）蟲（混）成」。劉釗認為古文字中相同偏旁從二個或三個經常無別，「 蟲 」可看成是「 䖵 」的繁體。季旭昇認為「 蟲 」和「 䖵 」實本同義。 《說文》以為「 蟲 」是有足動物的總名。《說文》：「蟲，有足謂之蟲，無足謂之豸。」此說或本於《爾雅》。《爾雅．釋蟲》：「有足謂之蟲，無足謂之豸。」邢昺疏：「此對文爾，散文則無足亦曰蟲。」故「 蟲 」可以是一切動物包括人的通稱。如《戰國策．秦策二》：「虎者，戾蟲；人者，甘餌也。」《大戴禮記．曾子天圓》：「毛蟲之精者曰麟，羽蟲之精者曰鳳，介蟲之精者曰龜，鱗蟲之精者曰龍，倮蟲之精者曰聖人。」 「 蟲 」多表示昆蟲。如《荀子．勸學》：「肉腐生蟲，魚栝生蠹。」《漢書．五行志》：「昭帝時，上林苑中大柳樹斷仆地，一朝起立，生枝葉，有蟲食其葉，成文字，曰『公孫病已立』。」 「 蟲 」也是古地名，在今山東濟寧境內。如《春秋左傳．昭公十九年傳》：「二月，宋公伐邾，圍蟲。」杜預注：「蟲，邾邑。」

蟲字的基本解释

蟲
chóng
见“虫”。

蟲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chóng］
［《廣韻》直弓切，平東，澄。］
亦作“虫2”。“虫3”的繁体字。“虫4”的繁体字。
(1)昆虫的通称。
(2)引申为产生虫。
(3)古指含人在内的一切动物。
(4)虫灾。
(5)古地名。春秋邾邑。故址在今山东济宁境内。
(6)姓。汉有蟲達。见《汉书·高惠高后文功臣表》。
[②]［tóng］
［《集韻》徒冬切，平冬，定。］
见“蟲2蟲”。

蟲字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蟲； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1098第16
【唐韻】直弓切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】持中切，?音种。【說文】从三虫，象形。凡蟲之屬皆从蟲。【大戴禮】有羽之蟲三百六十，而鳳凰爲之長。有毛之蟲三百六十，而麒麟爲之長。有甲之蟲三百六十，而神龜爲之長。有鱗之蟲三百六十，而蛟龍爲之長。有倮之蟲三百六十，而聖人爲之長。【爾雅·釋蟲】有足謂之蟲，無足謂之豸。【周禮·冬官考工記·梓人】外骨內骨，郤行仄行，連行紆行，以脰鳴者，以注鳴者，以旁鳴者，以翼鳴者，以股鳴者，以胷鳴者，謂之小蟲之屬，以爲雕琢。【大戴禮】二九十八，八主風，風主蟲。故蟲八月化也。【荀子·勸學篇】肉腐出蟲。　又【詩·大雅】蘊隆蟲蟲。【傳】蟲蟲而熱也。　又桃蟲，鳥名。【詩·周頌】肇允彼桃蟲。【傳】桃蟲，鷦也，鳥之始小終大者。　又【書·益稷】華蟲作繪。【孔註】雉也。　又地名。【左傳·昭十九年】宋公伐邾，圍蟲三月。【註】蟲，邾邑。　又書名。【魏志·裴松之註】邯鄲淳善蒼雅蟲篆。　又姓。【前漢·功臣表】曲成侯蟲達。　又直衆切，音仲。與蚛同，蟲食物也。

蟲字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蟲字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chóng］
["Guangyun" straight bow cut, flat east, clear. ]
Also known as "worm 2". Traditional characters for "虫3". Traditional characters for "虫4".
(1) Generic term for insects.
(2) It is extended to produce insects.
(3) Ancient refers to all animals including humans.
(4) Insect damage.
(5) Ancient place names. Spring and Autumn Luyi. The former site was in Jining, Shandong.
(6) Last name. Chinese have insects. See "Han Shu·Gao Hui Gao Later Wen Meritorious Table".
[②]［tóng］
["Jiyun" Tu Dongqie, Pingdong, Ding. ]
See "Insects 2 Insects".
insect
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　虫; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1098 Page 16
[Tang Yun] Straight bow cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] hold the middle cut, the type of sound. [Said the text] From the three insects, pictograms. All worms belong to worms. [Big Dai Li] There are three hundred and sixty feathered insects, and the phoenix is long. There are three hundred and sixty hairy worms, and unicorns are long. There are three hundred and sixty beetles, and the tortoise is long. There are three hundred and sixty scaly insects, and the dragon is long. There are three hundred and sixty worms of Luo, and the saint is long. [Erya·Release insects] There are enough insects, but there are no enough insects. 【Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji·Zi Ren】External bones and internal bones, but the lines are squat, continuous line, to sing, to note, to sing, to sing, to sing, to sing , The person who calls the croak is called the genus of small insects, and thinks that it is carved. 【Big Wearing Ceremony】Two and ninety-eight, eight dominate wind, and wind dominates insects. Therefore, the worm is also turned into August. 【Xunzi·Encouraging Learning】The meat rots out of worms.　[Poetry·Daya] Yunlong insects. [Propagation] Worms and hot too.　Peach insects, bird names. [Poetry·Zhou Song] Zhao Yun He peach worm. [Biography] Peach insects, wrens, the beginning of the bird is small and the end is big.　[Book·Yi Ji] Painted by Hua Chong. 【Hole Note】Pheasant also.　Also place name. [Zuo Zhuan·19th Year of Zhao] Song Gong defeated Lu, surrounded by insects in March. [Note] Insects, Chu Yi.　Also the title of the book. [Notes from Wei Zhi·Pei Song] Handan Chunshan Cangya insect seal.　Another last name. [Former Han · Heroes List] Qu Cheng Hou Chongda.　Anyone cuts straight again, the sound is in the middle. Same as worms, insect food is also.
